data.title: Yolatea frozen yogurt -- good stuff
data.text: Yolatea frozen yogurt -- good stuff! Sitting on a quiet street just off Main, this shop is quaint and a nice surprise. Yogurt is good, toppings are very good. Only recommendation is the atmosphere is a bit hard and cold. If it were more comfortable and inviting, I think that would help.

data.title: Fabulous non-dairy options in yogurt as well as those for regular dairy lovers!
data.text: The best place to have yogurt in Pleasanton! Nice downtown location. Great toppings bar,but mostly, great choices of flavors. Creamy, & non-dairy options, not to mention the "Tea with Tapioca Pearls" & crepes at the shop... Nice inside, clean and bathrooms.

data.title: Not bad just bland
data.text: Yolatea is off the beaten path. The place was good when it first open. However, the place is not being kept up to snuff. The last time we went--too many of the yogurt machine were in need of refill. The place could do with a good cleaning.

data.title: Green Jasmine Tea Served Cold with Tapioca Pearls
data.text: A refreshing and healthful treat after taking a yoga class from Downtown Yoga across the street. I've never had a drink like it, but loved it and will be back for more. Lovely woman working behind the counter, too.
